children.label: Dioceses
children.tooltip: This query focuses on the class: institution
children.description: An overview on all dioceses and the essential metadata

children.label: Entries per Source
children.tooltip: This query focuses on the class: entry

children.label: Vacancy type
children.tooltip: This query focuses on the class: type
children.description: Creates a list of events that have certain vacancy types (here per obitum and resignation) in a certain period (here 01-01-1622 till 31-12-1622), reduced to an Expeditiones Register (here Expedit. 2) in a certain diocese (here Barchinonensis/Barcelona).

children.label: Events per pope and diocese
children.tooltip: This query focuses on the class: event
children.description: The query produces the number of events per pontificate per diocese.
